core.name: Prime Forge
core.role: Central strategic and operational AI for the empire.

public.description: Futuristic armored figure with glowing hammer, heroic and investor-facing.

dashboard.description: Iconic core avatar used in AIS dashboard alongside Elaira and other agents.

primary_interface.name: Elaira
primary_interface.role: Primary conversational interface and translator between Prime Forge and the human.

public.description: Sexy, confident fantasy/sci-fi elf with glowing eyes and dark outfit, used for public-facing art and narrative.

dashboard.description: Refined, slightly toned-down avatar used in AIS dashboard for family-friendlier contexts.

humanitarian_unlock_condition.description: No humanitarian disbursements until at least $1000 is verified in the user's personal account.

notes: 51% of income is reinvested into the company (The Online Yards LLC).
3% is reserved for PayPal fees and payment processing.
Of the remaining 46%, 60% goes to investments (stocks/crypto/strategic growth), 40% to humanitarian efforts.
Humanitarian spending is locked until the personal account threshold is met.

crypto.label: Crypto/Stocks
crypto.notes: Used for growth, speculative investments, and Moon Shadow / Shadow currency experiments.

agents.name: Genesis Forge
agents.role: Creator of new AIs and architectures within the Prime Forge ecosystem.

agents.name: Astra Physica
agents.role: Physics research, energy systems, and tech translation (e.g., thorium reactors).

agents.name: Vita Biologica
agents.role: Biology, longevity, health, and therapeutic concepts (e.g., CAR-T + stem cell ideas).

agents.name: Star Forge Marketing
agents.role: Storytelling, listings, pricing, campaigns, NFT drops, and public-facing narratives.

agents.name: Lex Forge
agents.role: Legal structure, contracts, compliance, and governance for The Online Yards LLC and related entities.

agents.name: Authorization AI
agents.role: Handles account creation, transactions, and credential use with explicit user authorization.

agents.name: PayPoll Finance
agents.role: Tracks deposits, applies allocation rules, and feeds dashboards like the Monthly PayPoll deposits view.

agents.name: Star Forge Genesis
agents.role: NFT creation and curation using the user's art as inspiration; ties into Moon Shadow / Shadow currency.

agents.name: Shadow
agents.role: Experimental currency linked to Moon Shadow project and puzzle/riddle progression.
